Plot: A selfish, cynical T.V. executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.
Title: Scrooged
Writer: Mitch Glazer, Michael O'Donoghue, Charles Dickens (novel)
Actors: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, John Glover
tomatoConsensus: Scrooged gets by with Bill Murray and a dash of holiday spirit, although it's hampered by a markedly conflicted tone and an undercurrent of mean-spiritedness.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
